channel.title: Documentation on Adam Coding Corner
channel.description: Recent content in Documentation on Adam Coding Corner

item.title: Why should you use Tech proposals
item.description: Tech Proposal are a less formal way for internal documentation created before actual implementation. They also facilitate making technical decisions.

item.title: Android build hacks #3 - documentation with Dokka
item.description: This is third part in series of articles about Android build configuration, all parts will be linked right below. [#1 Build basics]({% post_url 2018-07-23-android-build-hacks %}) [#2 Build time optimization]({% post_url 2018-09-16-android-build-hacks-2 %}) [#3 Documentation with Dokka]({% post_url 2018-11-05-android-build-hacks-3 %}) Homework Wait what? You’ve wrote beautiful self-documenting code and someone tells you to create DOCUMENTATION for it? It’s already there! Well named methods and variables, design patterns used. If anyone wants to know how it works, he just needs to read through it - well named method by well named method…
